Name: Caladria Chronicles Volume 2
About the game: After the Otori twins, Tsubasa and Shou, end up getting kidnapped by some Nephrine forces, that’s when their plan is starting to surface. Things get even more intense as other Caladrians, like Nerisu’s group and the princess of Tamarin, Tokino Miyanohara, get involved. - 6 chapters to read - Around 29,000 words (Almost 3 hours of gameplay) - Fully voiced dialogue for main characters - 10 CGs - Over 10 colourful characters
